quizzes.question: What character is used to separate parameters from each other?
How many times can the declared function be used?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Multiple Parameters[/h1]

After defining the function, you can call it as many times as needed. 
JavaScript functions do not check the number of arguments received.
[note]If a function is called with missing arguments (fewer than declared), the missing values are set to [b]undefined[/b], which[b] [/b]indicates that a variable has not been assigned a value.[/note]
